content.en: My passion lies in creating clean and thoughtful design, ensuring user's smooth and memorable experience.
content.ru: Моя страсть - создание простых, но продуманных дизайнов, гарантирующих пользователю приятный и запоминающийся опыт.

content.en: I firmly believe that rigid and maintainable code forms the necessary foundation of any project. As a lifelong learner, I always strive to stay updated with the latest web development technologies.
content.ru: Я твердо убеждён, что организованный, удобный для сопровождения код является необходимой основой любого проекта. Я постоянно учусь и внимательно слежу за новейшими технологиями веб-разработки.

content.en: I specialize in development using Typescript, React and Next.js. I am always eager to take on new challenges and expand my skill set. Here is my current tech stack.
content.ru: Моя основная специализация - Typescript, React и Next.js. Но я всегда готов к новым вызовам и расширению своего арсенала. Мой полный текущий стек.

content.en: With a strong focus on clean design, responsiveness, and thoughtful user interactions, I am dedicated to delivering high-quality web solutions. I pay meticulous attention to detail, crafting every piece of the user interface with precision, ensuring that users can experience a smooth and memorable journey.

I firmly believe that rigid, maintainable, and readable code forms the necessary foundation of any project. As a lifelong learner, I always strive to stay updated with the latest web development technologies.

I specialize in development using JavaScript, React, Next.js, and TypeScript. While my main area of expertise lies in front-end development, I also have experience in full-stack web development with technologies such as Node.js, Next.js, and Python Django. I am always eager to take on new challenges and expand my skill set. Here is my current tech stack.
